A nice presentation about penguins

title: Quarto demonstration
text:
Choosing the data
As everyone always says,

penguins are very cute!

…so let’s work with penguin data today.






Note


Note that the palmerpenguins dataset is meant as an alternative to the commonly used iris data.

title: Quarto demonstration
text:
Loading packages & reading data
First, we need to:


load packages

read in data

check if that data is in the right format










Using the data without downloading it


This same dataset is also available in the package palmerpenguins.



We’ve removed missing values here, which means that the data has r nrow(penguins) rows now[^1].

By “right format”, we mean that the data is tidy, and ready to be summarised and graphed.

title: Quarto demonstration
text:
Some descriptive statistics






Figure 1: Penguin species drawing by Allison Horst







Figure 2: Explaining bill dimensions







The average bill length is r mean(penguins$bill_length_mm) mm and the average bill depth is r mean(penguins$bill_depth_mm) mm.

The data was collected between r min(penguins$year) and r max(penguins$year).

title: Quarto demonstration
text:
Graphs
Some ideas for graphs:

penguin weight by flipper length

for the entire data

or separately for each species

and additionally by sex


flipper and bill length

bill length and depth

title: Quarto demonstration
text:
Weight and flipper length
The following graphs are slightly simplified versions from the vignette for the {palmerpenguins} package.

title: Quarto demonstration
Quarto et github pages
text:
Faire un site avec “github pages”
Pour faire simple

dans le terminal de RStudio : quarto render
Explorateur windows : ouvrir C:\TEXTES\ECLAIRAGE\REVEAL_MATH_SLG\quarto_slg\math_blog\math_blog
Dans windows ouvrir un terminal de commande (administrateur) : cd C:\TEXTES\ECLAIRAGE\REVEAL_MATH_SLG\quarto_slg\math_blog\math_blog
git init
git add .
git commit -m “first commit”
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/omelectro1/pres_math_1.git
git push -u origin main

title: Quarto et github pages
text:
Dans github

https://github.com/omelectro1/pres_math_1/settings
Menu (gauche) “pages”
Branch “main” “root” -> Save

title: Quarto et github pages
section: Si problème de permissions avec le compte github
text:
Si problème de permissions avec le compte github
– Dans windows panneau de configuration -> Comptes d’utilisateurs -> Gestionnaire d’identifications -> Informations d’identification Windows - Effacer les “identifications génériques github”

title: Quarto et github pages
text:
Dans RStudio

Changer dans les fichiers *.qmd les textes et les idées (si, si)
Enregistrer les changements (CTRL-S)
Dans le terminal de RStudio : quarto render

title: Quarto et github pages
section: Dans le terminal de commande windows :
text:
Dans le terminal de commande windows :

git add .
git commit -m “SECOND commit”
git push -u origin main
